title: 2.13 Ribawi Transactions, Part 2 - Home loans, limited liability and QA
description:
In this episode, we talk about limited liability, home loans and answer some contemporary questions.

Topic: Limited liability, home loans, fees, debt, equity, transactions, charity, riba, interest.

Links for Telegram channel and social media available at
https://www.islamicfinancepodcast.com/pages/connect

Almir's Youtube channel available at https://www.youtube.com/almircolan

Podcast Hosted by Almir Colan.

Connect with us:

Be part of the conversation and keep in touch with us to find out about new episodes and other content.

Web: www.islamicfinancepodcast.com

Social media:

- YouTube

- Facebook (public page)

- Facebook (group)

- Twitter

- Instagram

----
